ExperimentTitle:
Experiment No. 22 - SMAW  Single V butt joint

AIM - To make a single V butt joint on the M.S. plate (Vertical position) – 3G
Steps:
Step 1

Grab the steel ruler from the tool table & measure both the job plates wrt. 150 x 100 x 10mm.

Step 2

Grab the scriber & steel ruler & mark the extra parts on the job plates.

Step 3

Grab the Center Punch & Hammer & make impressions on points on the line.

Step 4.1

Set the gas pressure on the regulator as per nozzle size.(Set pressure on regulator as 0.15 kg/cm2).

Step 4.2

Open acetylene control valve about 1/4th and light the flame with spark lighter.

Step 4.3

Keep the gas cutting torch (blow pipe) at 90° on job surface and the cutting line. Heat one end of the marking line till it turns cherry red. Keep a distance of 5mm between the job and the nozzle

Step 5

Look at the calculation on the tooltable for the bevel cutting. Grab the scriber & steel ruler & mark the extra parts on the job plates.

Step 6

Grab the Center Punch & Hammer & make impressions on points on the line.

Step 7.1

Open acetylene control valve about 1/4th and light the flame with spark lighter.

Step 7.2

Keep the gas cutting torch (blow pipe) at 90° on job surface and the cutting line. Heat one end of the marking line till it turns cherry red. Keep a distance of 5mm between the job and the nozzle

Step 8

Take the bevel plates to the welding table & place them in the designated place. Then place the spacers.

Step 9

Attach a 4mm electrode to the welding machine & do the tag welding. Remove the spacers after.

Step 10

Place the Plates in the designated upright position

Step 11

Perform the root run welding in the specified way. Clean up the slag with Chipping Hammer & Wire Brush.

Step 12

Set the current at 150A. Perform the weaving run welding in the specified way. Clean up the slag with Chipping Hammer & Wire Brush.

Step 13 

Perform the weaving run welding in the specified way. Clean up the slag with Chipping Hammer & Wire Brush.
